mapper.select: SELECT A.THEATER_INDEX,A.THEATER_NAME,A.THEATER_SEAT_X,A.THEATER_SEAT_Y,B.SHOWING_INDEX,B.SHOW_STARTTIME FROM CINEMA_THEATER A INNER JOIN MOVIE_SHOWING B ON A.THEATER_INDEX = B.THEATER_INDEX WHERE A.CINEMA_INDEX = #{indexCinema} AND B.MOVIE_INDEX = #{indexMovie} AND B.SHOW_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY THEATER_INDEX,SHOW_STARTTIME
